text: Melvin Russell Ballard, Jr. (October 8, 1928 - November 12, 2023) was a member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter- day Saints (LDS Church) from 1985 until his death. In 2018 he became Acting President of the Quorum. As a member of the Quorum of the Twelve, Ballard was accepted by church members as a prophet, seer, and revelator. He was the third most senior apostle among the ranks of the church. Ballard was born in Salt Lake City, Utah. Ballard died on November 12, 2023 at a hospital in Salt Lake City from respiratory failure at the age of 95.President M.
